Energy_Shield.display_help: The power radiating from this item cloaks the associated defense in a shield of energy, increasing its defense.
Energy_Shield.display_short_help: Adds a protective force field around the turret.

Analyzer.display_help: The all-seeing power of this defense penetrates the mind of the target, revealing their weaknesses and fears. The target's Defense and Resistances are lowered for a short time.
Analyzer.display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistances have been analyzed, making the base defenses more effective against you.

Snow_Crystal.display_help: This opens a chilling blast from the elemental realms, capable of causing damage and holding the target for a short period of time.
Snow_Crystal.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Cold damage.

Dampening_Ray.display_help: The Eye of Age inflicts on the target the curse of age. Muscles weaken and tire. Damage caused by the target is reduced until the effect wears off.

Scorpions_Surprise.display_help: Based on the latest in research from Black Scorpions labs, the X-8 Missile Launcher, better known as the Scorpion's Surprise, is one of the heaviest pieces of base defense ordnance available today. It combines heavy damage and stunning blasts into a surprise package that can rise from any floor surface.

Concealed_Turret.display_help: This turret is designed to provide the best in frontline defense. Mounted flush into the wall, it will automatically detect foe, emerge and fire. It is useful for defense in public locations where more obtrusive counter-measures might cause unwanted notice and for engineering ambush situations to deal with intruders.It has moderate lethal damage and recycle rate to provide support for your security teams.

Explode.display_help: When Turrets are destroyed, they tend to explode, but deal no damage.
